item.title: You can now join the # OpenStreetMap Foundation # OSMF as a voting member under the new Active Contributor Program, provided you achieve significant contribution, like 42 days of mapping over the last year or some other forms of contribution to the community (like organizing events, building software, etc.). https://www. reddit.com/r/openstreetmap/com ments/id6m2y/join_the_openstreetmap_foundation_under_the_shiny/
@ dajbelshaw Is Open Badges worth investigating in 2020 ? Seems it faded a bit, no ? https:// en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mozilla_ Open_Badges # OpenBadges

“Open Advice” is a knowledge collection from a wide variety of Free Software projects. It answers the question what 42 prominent contributors would have liked to know when they started, so you can get a head-start no matter how and where you contribute. Read it: http://www. open-advice.org . It’s 310-pages long read, released under # CC -BY-SA, but organized in small chapters, so you can cherry-pick. # ebooks # FOSS # OpenAdvice

Great to see the paper “Building an open community: a new opportunity for scholarly projects” showcases the creation of open # communities with # OpenStreetMap : https:// books.openedition.org/inha/493 5 . It identifies 4 principles to successful open communities: - open invitation - onboarding contributors - focusing the community - building a commons Probably, 2nd and 3rd are most difficult, and the paper gives good tips, but it’s worth sharing even more. What’s working best in your experience?

Lot of MapRoulette content these days. Here is an hour long video where Martijn van Exel @ mvexel explains how to create a # MapRoulette challenge for # OpenStreetMap using # GeoJSON data from an external source: https:// archive.org/details/maproulett e-create-a-challenge-geojson .
# OpenStreetMap US has a 28-min Mappy Hour video presenting # MapRoulette : https://www. youtube.com/watch?v=utuxHoRXDD Q .

# MapRoulette News for August 2020 by @ mvexel - Easier Challenge Creation - Leaderboard Improvements - Global Live Activity View - New Translations - See Nearby Next Tasks - Set Preferred MapRoulette Tags - Showing Custom Base Map Layers in Editors Read more: https://www. openstreetmap.org/user/mvexel/ diary/393893 Contribute: https:// maproulette.org # OpenStreetMap
A nice # tutorial on mapping artwork and memorials in # OpenStreetMap with # Wikimedia integration: https://www. openstreetmap.org/user/skunk/d iary/393826

Tell us your little tricks in # iD or # JOSM editor: https://www. reddit.com/r/openstreetmap/com ments/i5ayy8/tell_us_your_little_tricks_in_id_or_josm_editor/ # OpenStreetMap # keyboard # shortcuts # tips
Now taking bets when we will first reach 100 daily mappers in # Belgium . Ours is November 11th! # OpenStreetMap https:// twitter.com/osm_be/status/1291 306835530731521

Is there Free software to detect and manage # PLC Power-Line Communication adapters on a home network ? https:// en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Power- line_communication https:// en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/HomePl ug # IoT # LAN # SoHo # HomePlug
# MyOSMatic is a Free service to print maps using # OpenStreetMap data in PNG, PDF, and SVG format. https:// maposmatic.osm-baustelle.de # maposmatic
Impressive video of the 3D remodeling of the University of São Paulo's Museu Paulista in # OpenStreetMap , using the # JOSM editor. https://www. youtube.com/watch?v=PWcCO3l1AW A # F4Map # Kendzi3D
# OSMF proposes to fund # iD development and maintenance: https:// lists.openstreetmap.org/piperm ail/osmf-talk/2020-August/006997.html # OpenStreetMap

The 16th # OpenStreetMap # anniversary will be celebrated on the 8th of August, 2020. You’re invited to organize or join celebration events. https:// blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/08 /01/celebrate-the-16th-osm-anniversary/

In Microsoft # Flight # Simulator , most cities are procedurally generated by the AI, based data from # OpenStreetMap and an algorithm that provides architectural rulesets. Another 400 key cities have been closely replicated by hand, using detailed photogrammetry. https://www. theguardian.com/games/2020/jul /30/microsoft-flight-simulator-game # flightsimulator
# Lemme is a # Lemmy client for Android: https:// play.google.com/store/apps/det ails?id=com.lemmy

# OSMF is looking for a site reliability engineer # SRE who can help the # OpenStreetMap Foundation’s sysadmin team manage the growth in the demand for its services. Keeping core technical infrastructure which the OpenStreetMap project relies on running is one of the key responsibilities outlined in the foundation’s mission statement. The person will work full time, closely with the current team of volunteer sysadmins. https:// lists.openstreetmap.org/piperm ail/osmf-talk/2020-July/006973.html # jobs

# Firefly # cartography tricks normal people into realizing how much they like # maps . It has a pretty tight set of characteristics: - Dark, de-saturated basemap (usually imagery) - Masked highlight area and vignette - Single bright, glowing, thematic layer Read more: https:// adventuresinmapping.com/2016/1 0/17/firefly-cartography/

“Providing data to # OpenStreetMap ”: a straightforward how-to guide for organisations that want to contribute their data to # OSM . The guide covers all the prerequisites, as well as explaining the different approaches for integrating data, and discussing which approach will be most suitable in each context. https:// blog.openstreetmap.org/2020/07 /22/providing-data-to-openstreetmap-a-new-guide-for-data-owners
